subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Nine of the top 32 men’s players heading into the United States Open stand at least 6 feet 5 inches, the tallest being John Isner, at 6-10.
snippet: Nine of the top 32 men’s players heading into the United States Open stand at least 6 feet 5 inches, the tallest being John Isner, at 6-10.
